headline: Is Ameren Still Attractive After 2025 Grid Modernization And Recent Share Price Swings?
summary: Wondering if Ameren at around $99 a share is still a smart place for your money, or if the easy gains are already behind it, you are not alone. Despite a choppy last month, with the stock down about 5.1% over 30 days and 3.6% over the past week, Ameren is still up 11.6% year to date and 12.2% over the last year, building on a solid 47.8% gain over five years. Recent headlines have focused on Ameren's ongoing grid modernization and regulated utility investments, themes that tend to support...
